posts.post_title: FT/FS Pinkerton Adams and Mitchell SGC 60
posts.post_content:
I would love to trade these for similar Pinkerton Phillies subjects but now for sale...

#865 Babe Adams Pittsburgh NL $300
#424 Mike Mitchell Washington AL  $300

See scans for condition. Both Graded SGC 60 EX 5...they present nicer than my scans (darn scanner does not like SGC slabs).

Drop me a PM or email. 

Joshua
